Linux Server Project

IP address: 54.201.88.185
SSH port: 2200

website: catalog_project.com

Process: This was an extremely difficult and long process. I first went about creating the users and setting restrictions. I have three users, grader, ubuntu and catalog. Catalog has limited access to the catalog project.
I created ssh keys in order to allow for ssh authentication. For the firewall I enabled the ports 80, 123, and 2200 while disabling the default port. In order to get the Catalog Project hosted and running I
had to install apache2 and wgsi and then update both the wgsi and apach2 files to direct them to my catalog project files. I furthermore had to install all of the libraries that I imported in the creation of my
Catalog Project.
